message.content:
cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.MM, cs.AR, cs.SY

Reasoning: 
1. cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) - The paper discusses the next generation of cellular networks and proposes enhancements to improve network control operations. This falls under the scope of networking and internet architecture.
2. cs.IT (Information Theory) - The paper discusses the accuracy of beam selection and the delay in updating the beam pair, which are related to information theory.
3. cs.MM (Multimedia) - The paper discusses the use of mmWave frequencies to increase network capacity, which is related to multimedia applications.
4. cs.AR (Hardware Architecture) - The paper proposes enhancements to the beam management procedures, which may involve hardware architecture changes.
5. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The paper discusses the end-to-end performance and quality of service, which are related to systems and control.
